description: This file defines a 'Home' component using the Lightning.js framework. It manages the layout and interactions of the home page for a recipe exploration app, including rendering header, search bar, recipe grid, and recipe detail components, as well as handling data loading and user interactions.

classes.name: Home
classes.description: Lightning.js component representing the home page, managing sub-components and user interactions.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronously loads recipes based on a query and updates the component's items.

methods.name: doSearch
methods.description: Handles search input, triggers loading of new recipes, and refocuses the grid.

methods.name: openDetail
methods.description: Displays the details of a selected recipe.

methods.name: closeDetail
methods.description: Closes the recipe detail view and refocuses the grid.
